description: The content to display as the label.
The current value of the date-range-picker (controlled).
The variant of the date input.

type: default | primary | secondary | success | warning | danger
description: The color of the date input.
The size of the date input.
The radius of the date input.
The minimum value of the date-range-picker.
The maximum value of the date-range-picker.
The default value of the date-range-picker (uncontrolled).
The placeholder of the date-range-picker.
A description for the date-range-picker. Provides a hint such as specific requirements for what to choose.
An error message for the date input.
Validate input values when committing (e.g. on blur), returning error messages for invalid values.
Whether to use native HTML form validation or ARIA validation. When wrapped in a Form component, the default is `aria`. Otherwise, the default is `native`.
Element to be rendered in the left side of the date-range-picker.
Element to be rendered in the right side of the date-range-picker.
The name of the start date input element, used when submitting an HTML form.
The name of the end date input element, used when submitting an HTML form.
The position of the label.
Whether the date picker popover is open.
Whether the date picker popover is open by default.
Whether user input is required on the date-range-picker before form submission.
Whether the date-range-picker can be selected but not changed by the user.
Whether the date-range-picker is disabled.
Whether the date-range-picker is invalid.
The icon to toggle the date picker popover. Usually a calendar icon.
Controls the behavior of paging.
The number of months to display at once. Up to 3 months are supported.
Whether the element should receive focus on render.
Whether to display the time in 12 or 24 hour format.
Determines the smallest unit that is displayed in the date picker.
Whether to hide the time zone abbreviation.
When combined with isDateUnavailable, determines whether non-contiguous ranges may be selected.
Whether to always show leading zeros in the month, day, and hour fields.
The width to be applied to the calendar component.
Top content to be rendered in the calendar component.
Bottom content to be rendered in the calendar component.
Whether the calendar should show month and year pickers.
Props to be passed to the popover component.
Props to be passed to the selector button component.
The position of the selector button.
Props to be passed to the calendar component.
Props to be passed to the time input component.
Whether to disable all animations in the date picker.
Allows to set custom class names for the date-range-picker slots.
